abstract: I miss the old, unglamorous Duane Reade, where you could find shampoo without having to wander through a maze of sandwiches, yogurt parfaits and frozen pizza. Still, stick with it and you can find a few things worthy of navigating the aisles.
snippet: I miss the old, unglamorous Duane Reade, where you could find shampoo without having to wander through a maze of sandwiches, yogurt parfaits and frozen pizza. Still, stick with it and you can find a few things worthy of navigating the aisles.

headline.main: My Three Favorite Things to Buy at Duane Reade
